title: Knicks–Nuggets brawl
summary: The Knicks–Nuggets brawl was an on-court altercation at a National Basketball Association (NBA) game between the New York Knicks and Denver Nuggets at Madison Square Garden in New York City, New York, United States, on Saturday, December 16, 2006. This altercation became the most penalized on-court fight in the NBA since the Malice at the Palace, which occurred on November 19, 2004.
